name: Reaching the Sun
description:
Embody Api, the future high priestess of Machu Picchu, and fulfill your destiny! The Sun God challenges you to solve his riddles… Will you be up to it?

In Peru, an exceptional child was born, Api. Her destiny is to become the high priestess of her city. Api must make a journey to the top of Machu Picchu to prove her worth and obtain an artifact offered by the sun god- Inti- as a sign of divine approval.

How to play? 

Use 

- left arrow to go left

-right arrow to go right

-up arrow to jump

You cant double jump so think carefully.
